titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on products containing 3-Mesityl-2-oxo-1-oxaspiroY4.4?non-3-en-4-yl 3,3-dimethylbutyrate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/13/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on products containing 3-Mesityl-2-oxo-1-oxaspiroY4.4?non-3-en-4-yl 3,3-dimethylbutyrate.
